title: Benefits & How to Apply : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Q1. Are these benefits applicable to movies, non-movies and Stream?
> Absolutely! Is is applicable on cinema, stream and live events.
Q2. Can one or more benefits be clubbed together in a transaction?
> There are a few criteria's applied to this offers, you will be unable to club BMS cash with any other offer.
Only F&B discount (Rs.100) can be clubbed with the cinema ticket discount (Rs.500 max) while booking for a 2 or more movie tickets.
Q3. Can I get this card from anywhere else outside of BMS?
Yes, apart from the BMS platforms (Android-iOS apps, mobile web and web), the BMS play card is also available at RBL’s website and app.
Q4. Where and how can I opt for the Play card?
> You can opt from the card from various touch points in the BMS app. You’ll see various banners across the purchase journey and also from within the “Profile” section.
Q6. Can this card be used outside of BMS, online or offline? If yes, what benefits do I get for using it outside BMS?
> Yes, this card can be used other online on websites and apps, and also on the offline pos machines.
Q7. Do I get any reward points like I get for my other credit cards? If yes, what’s the earn structure?
> Nope, there are no reward points associated with this card.
Q9. If I’m a guest user, how will I be able to apply for the BMS Play card?
> As a guest user, you may see some BookMyShow Play card banners in your purchase journey and a Play card option in the profile menu. As a guest you’ll be able to explore the benefits of the card, however, to apply for the card, you’ll have to login and check your eligibility.
Q9.
I’ve encountered an unsuccessful transaction in which I had redeemed the offer on the play card. Will I be able to use the offer again?
> Yes, the offer can be re-used after 30 minutes
